# init(name:target:selector:)

**Initializer**

Creates a custom action object with the specified name, target, and selector.

## Declaration

```swift
init(name: String, target: any NSObjectProtocol, selector: Selector)
```

## Creating a Custom Action

- **init(name:handler:)**: Creates a custom action object with the specified name and handler.

items.description: Creates a custom action object with the specified name and handler.
